Name: Highway Thru Hell
Title: Lives On The Line
Desc: A crash shocks Team Reliable; Cam races to rescue a fellow tow operator stuck on a blind corner.
LongDescription: A terrifying crash involving one of their own shocks Team Reliable; Dylan and Merv pair up to lift a heavy load of steel pilings off a highway; Cam races to rescue a fellow tow operator stuck on a blind corner.
